amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for Violence Against Women by $750,000 and reduces funding for DOJ administration by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for the general administration account of DOJ by $750,000, and then increase funding for victims services, and enhanced training and services to end violence against women under the Violence Aginst Women and DOJ Reauthorization Act of 2005 by $750,000 each.

vote.text: On agreeing to the MacArthur amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the MacArthur amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. MacArthur.
